name: RentMoola
description: RentMoola is a mobile payment network.
overview:
RentMoola is a mobile and online payment network in partnership with Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover that allows renters to pay rent and other fees with their credit cards. Online and mobile, auto-pay and one time payments, from rent, condo fees, parking and more! By using their credit card renters can earn points, miles, cash back much faster for trips and stuff they want! It’s fast, easy, safe and secure.

RentMoola offers a mobile and online payment solution, an industry leading convenience fee and their MoolaPerks Progam which will offer exclusive discounts, offers and deals.

RentMoola provides their service to property managers and landlords at no cost along with their marketing kit to get each building RentMoola Certified quickly and easily. Once certified, property managers and landlords are eligible for the MoolaBack program.
